title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Navigation - Scroll all games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with an MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are enough games on the schedule to scroll
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND scrolls the list of games
custom_expected: THEN all the scheduled games will load properly

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Navigation - Date navigation using arrows
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on either arrow to the left and right of the date
custom_expected:
THEN the corresponding date according to which arrow is tapped:
> Tapping on the right arrow will load the scheduled games of the next day
> Tapping on the left arrow will load the scheduled games of the previous day

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Navigation - Toggling between Highlights and MiLB.TV
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the MiLB.TV page will load that day's scheduled games
AND when the user taps on the Highlights tab
THEN the videos (highlights) page will load

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Navigation - Date navigation bound to this season
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on the back date navigation arrow
custom_expected: THEN the user will only be able to move back to dates within the current season

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Navigation - Date navigation is limited to one day in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is at least one day left in the current season
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND taps on the forward date navigation arrow
custom_expected: THEN the user will only be able to move forward to one day after the current date

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Scheduled game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a scheduled game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the scheduled start time in the right of all games that have not started
AND the teams will be in bold black text

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Live game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a live game on
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on Videos
AND taps on MiLB.TV tab
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the word "Live" on the right of the cell for the games that are in progress

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Completed, Pre-Archived game (Coming Soon Status)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game that had video and has been completed
AND an Archive has not yet been posted for the completed game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the will see the words "Coming Soon" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the teams will be in bold black text
AND the user will be unable to tap on the video to launch a stream

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Archived game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game that had video and has been completed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the will see the word "Archive" in the right of the cell of games that have been completed and had video
AND the teams will be in bold black text

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Scheduled game - Time Zones continental US
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are scheduled games
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sets the device time zone to CT
AND the user taps on Videos
AND taps on MiLB.TV tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the scheduled games times in the time zone of the device
AND the the teams will be in bold black text

> Repeat for MT and PT

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Scheduled game - Time Zones outside continental US
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are games scheduled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user changes their device time zone to GMT
AND the user taps on Videos
AND taps on MiLB.TV tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see all scheduled games in ET
AND the teams will be in bold black text

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Away team before Home team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game on the schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the away listed before the home team for every game

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - All team names are accurate
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game on the schedule
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected: THEN the user will see all the team names displayed accurately

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Grid updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are live games going on or about to begin
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND waits on that page while an active game completes
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the game go from LIVE to COMING SOON to ARCHIVE

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Updates after backgrounded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game with a live MiLB.TV feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND backgrounds the app
custom_expected: THEN when the user brings the app back up the grid will update accordingly

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - 10 AM EST Scoreboard Flip
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user sets their device time to 9:59 AM EST
AND the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND notices the previous days games have loaded
custom_expected:
THEN when the device time has hit 10 AM EST
AND the user navigates to the scoreboard
AND back to the videos tab, the current days games will load

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Display - Favorite team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND the user has set a favorite team
AND the user's favorite team is playing on that day
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected: THEN the game of the user's favorite team will be at the top

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Launching video - Archived game - MiLB.TV subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is an archived game that day
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user taps on the archived game
custom_expected: THEN the selected archived game will begin to play

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Launching video - While audio is playing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is audio available
AND there is a MiLB.TV feed available
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the ellipses button
AND the user taps on the Gameday Audio option
AND taps on a team's live audio feed
AND presses the More back button
AND taps on the videos tab at the bottom
AND taps on a MiLB.TV live feed
custom_expected: THEN the audio will stop playing and the MiLB.TV video feed will begin

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Double-A/Triple-A setting does not impact list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND the user has enabled Double-A mode
AND the user is on the MiLB.TV tab of the Videos Page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the ellipses button
AND Turns 'AA Off, AAA On' ON
AND returns to the Video page
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the MiLB.TV list will not update
AND both League games will be listed

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Launching video - Not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in with any entitled account
AND there is an in progress game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user selects the "Live" game cell
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the MiLB.TV Subscriber Login page
AND after entering entitled account credentials, the feed will play accordingly

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Launching video - MiLB.com Account without MiLB.TV Access
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.com account
AND the account does not have MiLB.TV access
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
AND the user taps on a video game feed
custom_expected:
THEN the app will attempt to verify access
AND the user will receive a message stating:
> MiLB.TV Access
> You are not authorized to watch this feed.

AND there will be a Cancel button in the top-right corner

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Filtering - Dead-Stream games displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there is a game set to MEDIA_DEAD that is "Postponed" or "Cancelled" 
AND the MEDIA_DEAD game has video_enabled=1
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to view the game in the MiLB.TV Media Grid
AND tapping on the game will launch the video

title: MiLB.TV - Grid: Filtering - Class A Games can appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in with a MiLB.TV entitled account
AND there are Class A Games available for MiLB.TV
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the Videos tab
AND the user selects the MiLB.TV button at the top
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see Double and Triple A games
AND see Class A games
AND these games are tappable if the media is present
